sn18.10:1.10: “Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn18.10:1.11: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they’re freed, they know they’re freed.
sn18.10:1.12: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
